item.title: Frozen Assets: Winter Storm Fern Is Heating Up These 3 Energy Winners
item.description: Intense winter storms stress the power grid and demonstrate the value of reliable nuclear generation and robust natural gas infrastructure.

item.title: Why RTX Stock Is Surging in 2026—and Why It Might Not Be Done Yet
item.description: Defense sector leader RTX outperformed in Q4 and provided favorable guidance, driving its stock price higher; analysts are leading the market.

item.title: CoreWeave’s NVIDIA Boost Fueled a Rally—Now Comes the Hard Part
item.description: NVIDIA’s investment has added fresh fuel to CoreWeave's momentum, but analysts remain divided on if it's a vote of confidence, or a cause for concern.

item.title: AppLovin Faces Money-Laundering Claims—Here’s What’s Missing
item.description: AppLovin shares took a significant tumble recently as another short report hit the firm. See the dramatic controversy investors are assessing.

item.title: SoundHound’s Agentic AI Push Could Be Right—Even if the Chart Isn’t
item.description: SoundHound AI is expanding into agentic AI with its Amelia platform, which could make SOUN stock a buying opportunity for risk-averse investors
